name: Falling Sky: Reckoning
description:
FALLING SKY: RECKONING

When the sky falls, what are you going to do?

Moving the blocks around? No! It's not T*tris ffs

You are equipped with cannon, at least to make the blocks fit in space

Use LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to move, and SPACE to shoot

First attempt on game jam, I hope I can make better games in the future

Submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2020
